title: Modernize devcontainer.json (deprecated settings/features format)
Add Renovate regex manager for Hugo version tracking
description:
Renovate config is minimal and doesn't track Hugo version in netlify.toml.

## Current State
renovate.json only extends `config:base` with no custom managers.

## Changes Required
Add regex manager to detect and update Hugo version:

```json
{
  "$schema": "https://docs.renovatebot.com/renovate-schema.json",
  "extends": ["config:base"],
  "regexManagers": [
    {
      "fileMatch": ["netlify\\.toml$"],
      "matchStrings": ["HUGO_VERSION = \"(?<currentValue>.*?)\""],
      "depNameTemplate": "gohugoio/hugo",
      "datasourceTemplate": "github-releases",
      "extractVersionTemplate": "^v(?<version>.*)$"
    }
  ]
}
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Renovate creates PRs when new Hugo versions are released
- [ ] All 3 Hugo version references in netlify.toml are updated together

title: Modernize Dockerfile (Golang 1.19 → 1.25, fix deprecated base image)
description:
The devcontainer Dockerfile uses several outdated/deprecated components.

## Current Issues
1. **Golang base image**: Uses golang:1.19 (EOL), should be 1.25
2. **Hugo download URL**: Uses old pattern `Linux-64bit`, should be `linux-amd64`
3. **Deprecated base image**: Uses `mcr.microsoft.com/vscode/devcontainers/base` which is deprecated

## Changes Required
- Line 1: `FROM golang:1.19` → `FROM golang:1.25`
- Line 15: Fix Hugo download URL pattern
- Line 21: `FROM mcr.microsoft.com/vscode/devcontainers/base` → `FROM mcr.microsoft.com/devcontainers/base:ubuntu`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Devcontainer builds successfully
- [ ] Hugo installed and functional in container
close_reason: Updated Dockerfile: golang:1.25 (already done), linux-amd64 URL pattern, and mcr.microsoft.com/devcontainers/base:ubuntu

title: Update Hugo version in netlify.toml (0.140.2 → 0.154.2)

- context.staging.environment (line 21)
